name: The Last Door (winster287)
description:
This game is made by a group of 3 putting in our best effort! 

ttps://pokedeveloper.itch.io/ - POKE DEV

https://dee-bala10.itch.io/  - DEEBALA

https://winster287.itch.io/ - WINSTER287

[EPILEPSY WARNING - Game contains flashing lights, pop up images and text. Please avoid if you have any medical condition as such ]

[1 bug that is spotted: If you die in some ways, to restart you may need to relaunch the game. sorry.]

You're all alone...in a place you don't recognize. The only thing you know, is you need to get out of there!

The Last Door is a puzzle horror game in which you need to find an escape! There are doors everywhere you go but any of them could be your last...for the good but most probably for the bad. 

Will you be able to escape? Is your soul worthy enough? Only one way to find out!

[Spoiler Warning]

Game Contains multiple paths, exits and ways to proceed. If you want the full experience, try finding both the escape routes and if you're passionate, all the ways to die too haha.

Have Fun! :)
